offerInfos.offerDetails:
OFFER DETAILS: Activate a new Music & Entertainment subscription Plan and pay $4.99 each month for your first 12 months, plus get free activation (a $15 savings). During your initial 12-month subscription term, your service will be upgraded (at no additional cost to you) and you will receive the channels and features available in our Platinum Plan. Savings based on monthly rate for the Platinum, currently $22.99/mo. Fees and taxes apply. A credit card is required on this offer.

Your Music & Entertainment subscription plan will automatically renew thereafter every month and you will be charged according to your chosen payment method at then-current rates (currently $17.99/mo.). Please see our Customer Agreement at www.siriusxm.com for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes online methods or calling us at 1-866-635-2349.

All fees, content and features are subject to change. This offer cannot be combined with any other and may be modified or terminated at any time. Offer good for new subscriptions only. Channel lineup varies by package. This offer is presented exclusively by SiriusXM and may not be republished without the consent of SiriusXM.
